welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Perrine, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Central Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Miami International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal at Miami International Airport primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A terminal at Miami International Airport primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Opa Locka Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Perry Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers exclusive amenities for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport.
